title: Where there is any conflict between the width provided in the DP and the width resulting from the prescription of a Regular Line of a street under the MMC Act, 1888, the larger of the two shall prevail
clause_text: Where there is any conflict between the width provided in the DP and the width resulting from the prescription of a Regular Line of a street under the MMC Act, 1888, the larger of the two shall prevail. Further, if there is variation in the alignment of DP Road and sanctioned Regular Line under the MMC Act, 1888of same width, the alignment as per the Regular Line shall prevail.
